title: worst logo?
content: whats the worst recently designed logo?
author: fredcastle

comments.content:
Something about this one that I don't like...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720135548im_/http:/typophile.com/files/obama-150x150_5515.png)

The original was so much better...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720135548im_/http:/typophile.com/files/old_5415.jpg)
I know it's not that recent, but as far as logos currently in use by very large corporations, Verizon's is about the worst I've seen.

Brandnew, perhaps unintentionally, has become \*the\* place to go for the latest in bad corporate logo design:

[http://www.underconsideration.com/brandnew/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720135548/http:/www.underconsideration.com/brandnew/ "http://www.underconsideration.com/brandnew/")
